snippet: President Obama will make a nationally televised address on the plans to address the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, a Sunni extremist group that has killed two American hostages.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN, MARK LANDLER and JEREMY W. PETERS

lead_paragraph: President Obama will make a nationally televised address on the plans to address the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, a Sunni extremist group that has killed two American hostages.

headline.main: Obama to Detail Plans on ‘Destroying’ ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
